name: CafeBucks
description: A website for cafe management I and my friends had done as a college project. It can be migrated into full POS system if I have available time to do it.

name: HardBank
description: A financial website for transferring account balance to other users in the system. Using knowledge of authentication, relational database CRUD operations and transaction.

name: SoftPower
description: This is my fullstack website about soft power concept which has details on Thai soft power and its definition. Using knowledge of routing, authentication, API, ORM and NoSQL database.

name: Portfolio
description: My portfolio website for presenting my biography, education profiles, preferences, skills and projects I have done.

name: farm.exe
description: A college project of a MERN stack website for discovering tourist attractions in Thailand by random the data from 3rd party API by TAT. Additional features include reviews, authentication, and authorization.
